name: Hailu Mergia
description: '''Hailu Mergia''' ({{Langx|am|ኃይሉ መርጊያ|ḫayilu merigīya}}) is an [[Ethiopians|Ethiopian]] [[keyboardist]], [[accordion|accordionist]], [[composer]], and [[arranger]] now based in [[Washington, D.C.|Washington D.C.]], United States. He is known for his role in the [[Walias Band]] in the 1970s, one of the most significant groups in [[Ethiopian Golden Age of music|Ethiopia’s "golden age" of music]].
